data.name: [Chilla's Art] The Radio Station | 深夜放送
data.detailed_description:
The Radio Station | 深夜放送 is a Japanese psychological horror game.

Supporters' content can be turned on and off on the title screen.
The game has autosave system.

Key Features:

Immersive experience: An atmospheric, photo-realistic graphics intensifies the horror experience.

VHS film aesthetic: VHS aesthetic emulates the look and feel of CRT screens including phosphor screen trail and bleeding, VHS tape noise, interlacing, and jitter in the analog video signal adding extra immersion to the horror experience.

Gameplay: This game is primarily a "walking simulator" genre with puzzle-solving elements.

Psychological horror: The game will drive you insane.

Japanese Theme: Environment art inspired by Japanese horror films.

Multiple endings: There are 3 endings.

data.short_description: The Radio Station | 深夜放送 is a Japanese psychological horror game.
data.supported_languages:
English, Japanese*, Simplified Chinese, Vietnamese, Korean, Russian
*languages with full audio support

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 7 SP1+ x64
  • Processor: Intel/Amd
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Nvidia/Amd
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 10 GB available space
  • Sound Card: Yes
  • Additional Notes: Disable or lower shadow/texture quality for better performance.
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows 10 x64
  • Processor: Intel i7
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Nvidia GTX 1650 or AMD equivalent (~60fps 1080p )
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 10 GB available space
  • Sound Card: Yes
  • Additional Notes: Turn off lights. Wear headphones. Play.
